meanings.sent1: The movie's unobjectionable plot kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent2: The unobjectionable behavior of the students made the teacher proud.
meanings.sent3: The unobjectionable puppy chased its tail in circles, amusing everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her unobjectionable smile lit up the room like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The unobjectionable solution to the problem was so clear, it was like a bright light in the dark.

meanings.sent1: The cake was unobjectionable to all the party guests.
meanings.sent2: His unobjectionable manners made him a favorite among his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The unobjectionable idea of wearing pajamas to work seemed amusing at first.
meanings.sent4: The unobjectionable taste of victory was sweeter than any dessert.
meanings.sent5: Her unobjectionable singing voice was like a melody that soothed the soul.
